results.text: Update on the SumoMe outageSumoMe ( http://sumome.com )We got your back----------------Update on the SumoMe outage---------------------------You might not have even noticed, but on Tuesdaynight, our servers on GoDaddy were attacked, causing an outagefor some of you for the first time in 2.5 years.The bad news: Some people on the internet are not very nice.The good news: Our team of Sumos has your back and made changesto prevent this from happening in the future.All SumoMe apps and services are 100% functional to you and allyour visitors.We love you for using SumoMe, which is why we work 24/7 to makesure you’re kicking butt and growing your business every singleday.We got your back,The SumoMe TeamAppSumo ( http://www.appsumo.com/ )View this email in your browser. (https://sumome.com/stories/we-got-your-back?s=6fabb4131c9aff1dcf2f104531325fe78c5b73068e238bc33d950c12b2956239 )Sent by Sumo Group, Inc., 1305 E 6th St. #3, Austin, TX 78702.Unsubscribe ( http://sumome.com/account/emailsettings?e=garrethdottin%40gmail.com&t=1468714866000&h=7e6946fb92c74d273b6083d5763e4136&type=sc&id=acaab4cf-9e86-4e24-b870-8a769e492c2a )
results.subject: We got your back

results.text: If you use Word docs, Excel spreadsheets, or PowerPoint presentations in your work, you can now seamlessly add Lucidchart diagrams for maximum visual impact.Get Free Add-ins (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/landing/microsoft-office/logged-in?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=bluebutton&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz--feX12ykeecVpID39amR8vZbssmriRrAHVZS0qlC-2bck3TPaJe95fJs1tJ72nTtPki6XwSqfjhr-mxQFuJnMczd_Cqw&_hsmi=31616229)Proof that flowcharts can be funAre you a Woody or a Buzz Lightyear? Which Game of Thrones house do you belong to? And just who are Rey’s parents? Find answers to these and other questions in our growing collection of pop culture-inspired flowcharts. (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/flowcharts?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-8eZYrbrD5qKuvs5RD5PAnvXRlpNXqbc0zebiu-X0iQoGyjRpEQw0X8eAYNQguGg9bfJgOvNFMM0yxxjU7FVa1a-FzNCg&_hsmi=31616229)Learn to diagram like a proThe more you learn about different types of diagrams, the better you’ll be able to visualize innovative solutions in all you do. Check out our complete guides to:- Concept mapping (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/concept-map?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9xcCgseyrZfGZgxpUAJwUxAGuTGd3zLo_fTN6lgIkI6o6_w6bUbTjaGpjeUXKDE6Tcpsgk9Xy-Pqn7hn84Kcv1ONNC4g&_hsmi=31616229) - Process mapping (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/process-mapping?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz--U7gr6klCYaScTf_pa-uuTJyD2uM4v6imPspUxl-ANPJE9tEuwBgEHVxMBa43PJ8i104VeOtm3ma1GRJH0-5wBF4TWlw&_hsmi=31616229) - Data flow diagrams (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/data-flow-diagram?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-8mZbPon4Koa21pWMgYU4VV3uvRCKfg2xE6KqVow8KBi0QXKgrmaq7n1oE5fBDpOhoqlxRK_5ADGri1MHJw30SksJ0aLA&_hsmi=31616229) - Database design (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/database-diagram/database-design?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-_sqhiNK0IVB3C4Z8Jo3jFKQ0AWhfsCjoX-Qfrsd3EHt7rARK_b_St97L-qFh7Oe90-cuFObJVD4TtF5AK8K0JBkshfRQ&_hsmi=31616229) - Value stream mapping (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/value-stream-mapping?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-8K-8kx-W7lChbXyOZAHC9LIKT3kxdZTVj1rFgMeaH-dCA-4Ruyq-TQaKleVIj_p3WHrQgwqQAeR4nM5ov4aDIIAMtClg&_hsmi=31616229) - Piping and instrumentation diagrams (https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/p-and-id?utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-_dXxjRhHNIHLifg-aD4zqFF4mEdk7AnDXbPJ_zq_KvcX6AWy6D1o7hlv5gZPtxgiZ7oxb2x2uNhKKP8_UMYI35qdJRxg&_hsmi=31616229)– The Lucid TeamYou received this email because you are subscribed to Product Features from Lucid Software Inc.Update your email preferences (http://wwv.lucidchart.com/hs/manage-preferences/unsubscribe?v=1&d=eyJlYSI6ImdhcnJldGguZG90dGluQGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImVjIjozMTYxNjIyOSwic3Vic2NyaXB0aW9uSWQiOjM2MjU4NiwiZXQiOjE0Njg0MzAyMzE4NTUsImV1IjoiMzIwZTNmYTctOWMwMS00NjE2LTg4N2YtZDc1ZTBhNTYzODM3In0%3D&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-93nEjABHktEyNUawU95LuhwV0pvVzcVEBa_Qkw3jDRcjugmjMMophVDVBN2oQtfkOoQBNmJWGs_LUWXebZMw2l1tst1g&_hsmi=31616229) to choose the types of emails you receive.Unsubscribe from all future emails (http://wwv.lucidchart.com/hs/manage-preferences/unsubscribe-all?v=1&d=eyJlYSI6ImdhcnJldGguZG90dGluQGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImVjIjozMTYxNjIyOSwic3Vic2NyaXB0aW9uSWQiOjM2MjU4NiwiZXQiOjE0Njg0MzAyMzE4NTUsImV1IjoiMzIwZTNmYTctOWMwMS00NjE2LTg4N2YtZDc1ZTBhNTYzODM3In0%3D&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=31616229&_hsenc=p2ANqtz--dRQnmuR4fMPwkGZyGOUbuyYmurqYC958egYRF-AnlWp2-mQ8LaGZ5l6rFOTrkWICmW8qdlWcxtD6GMgA9elU9vVAHzg&_hsmi=31616229)Lucid Software Inc10808 South River Front ParkwaySuite 600South JordanUtah84095
